original: 吳郡陽羨人，東吳官員，周處之父。石亭之戰前，詐降曹魏，誘使曹休出兵，曹休中計大敗，魏國十餘萬兵馬因而潰滅。
text: Wu Junyangxian, Soochow official, father of Zhou Chu. Before the Battle of Shiting, Cao Xiu surrendered Cao Wei and induced Cao Xiu to send troops. Cao Xiu was defeated in a big way, and Wei was defeated by more than 100,000 soldiers.
